overview:
As Vice President Operations of MEEZA, Michael Molson is responsible for service portfolio management, supplier management, service transition and enterprise architecture.

Prior to arriving in Qatar, Michael has played pivotal roles in the success of a number of high-growth start-up businesses and established technology companies in Canada and Europe.

He has held technical leadership and management positions across a wide range of functions including service strategy and innovation, pre-sales engineering, technical and customer operations, enterprise architecture and data centre management with organizations such as Ontario Power Generation (Nuclear), AT&T Canada, MTS/Allstream and MessageLabs Group.
